name: Marketplace
description: This project is an online web application in ASP.NET Core MVC framework for an marketplace where curstomers can find products and suppliers. This project includes user registration and validation via EntityFramework, SQL Server database and Model-View-Controller architecture. It has client and server-side validation.

name: Car Shop
description: Project of a vehicle registration system for online commerce. The system is a REST API with CRUD functionality for multiple types of vehicles. Developed using the MSC architecture and aiming for object-oriented programming (OOP).

name: Futebol Clube
description: Project of a football championship management system. The project is Full-Stack, composed of a REST API and a front-end page built with React.js. The integration was done using Axios.

name: Solar System
description: This project is a web application that provides information about our space missions to the solar system. The application is built with JavaScript and React, styled with vanilla CSS.

name: Frontend Online Store
description: This project is a online store that uses public API to fetch products data. The application is built with JavaScript and React, styled with SASS and Tailwind.

name: TrybeSmith
description: Project of a sales system for handmade forged objects. The project is a REST API with JWT validation.
